page.title: 16TRANSPORT IN THE OAKLEY AREA
page.content: The{A907,}the main road between Dun- fermline and Stirling,runs through the Oakley area.It is an extremely busy road carrying a large volume of traf- fic cross country from east to west. There are two country roads joining the{A907 }with the{A985 }which although small are also very busy.{44% of the people in Oakley have 1 car, {12% }own 2 cars and{10% }run motorbikes. There are{2 bus services}passing through the Oakley area to Dunfermline and Rosyth at half hour intervals. There is also a mini bus service connecting Blairhall, Oakley with Valleyfield.{31% }use the bus services regularly. Asda,the supermarket in Dunfermline, runs a free shopping bus on a Thursday which{9% }use.
